About Me

Welcome to my Personal Webpage. In this space, I post the most recent notifications.

  • 20.12.2016: I am flying to San Francisco to visit my lovely cousins for the Christmas Break!

  • 16.10.2016: I am continuing my job as a Research Assistant at the Databases and Information Systems Group under PD Dr. Christoph Quix
  • 05.10.2016: I delivered a talk at i5 on Machine Learning Methods. Slides are available here
  • 01.10.2016: I successfully completed Level A1 in German at the Sprachenzentrum RWTH Aachen
